summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.0°C) and outside temperature (down 1.7°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1773 m), feels like temperature (up 4.9°C), outside temperature (up 3.7°C), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 765m and a high of 2220m, averaging 956.0m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
